doc.title: Magicians of the Earth: Kings of the Water
doc.plot: Cyprien Toukoudagba is an important person in the city of Abomey in the West African Republic of Benin. He paints the religious houses of the "vudun" - sacred temples dedicated to the worship of revered ancestors. The movie follows Cyprien as he paints three brilliantly colored vodun figures and takes part in three local ceremonies.
